body:
If you need to pass back revenue in a specific currency, reference the list below for the three letter code associated with your currency. This is the value that you will need to enter for the adroll_currency part of your enhanced conversion tracking script.

Please note, not all currencies in the full list below are supported on the dashboard. At this time, we can set your dashboard to the following currencies:

  • AUD, Australian Dollar
  • EUR, Euro
  • GBP, British Pound
  • JPY, Japanese Yen
  • USD, US Dollar

If the currency you pass through your enhanced conversion tracking script is different from what is set on your dashboard, we convert this amount to your dashboard currency (default USD) using the daily exchange rate. This adjusted value is what we'll display on your dashboard.

  • AED, UAE Dirham
  • ARS, Argentine Peso
  • AUD, Australian Dollar
